Object.Name: CrowdBox Measurements
Object.Description1: This LWM2M Object provides CrowdBox-related measurements such as serving cell parameters, backhaul timing advance, and neighbour cell reports.

Item.Name: Serving Cell ID
Item.Description: Serving cell ID as specified by the cellIdentity field broadcast in SIB1 of the serving cell (see TS 36.331).

Item.Name: Serving Cell RSRP
Item.Description: Serving cell RSRP, as defined in TS 36.133, Section 9.1.4. Range: RSRP_00; RSRP_01 .. RSRP_97

Item.Name: Serving Cell RSRQ
Item.Description: Serving cell RSRQ, as defined in TS 36.133, Section 9.1.7. Range: RSRQ_-30; RSRQ_-29 .. RSRQ_46

Item.Name: Serving Cell SINR
Item.Description: SINR of serving cell as estimated by the CrowdBox. Note that this is a proprietary measurement dependent on the UE chipset manufacturer. The UE chipset used should be stated in the accompanying product documentation.

Item.Name: Cumulative Backhaul Timing Advance
Item.Description: The cumulative timing advance signalled by the current serving cell to the CrowdBox. This is the sum of the initial timing advance signalled in the MAC payload of the Random Access Response (11 bits, 0 .. 1282) and subsequent adjustments signalled in the MAC PDU of DL-SCH transmissions (6 bits, -31 .. 32). See TS 36.321 for details.

Item.Name: Neighbour Cell Report
Item.Description: A link to the "Neighbour Cell Report" object for each neighbour cell of the CrowdBox.
